execution_plan.description: Compute number of products purchased (order items) per customer from the orders database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.customer_id, COUNT(oi.order_item_id) AS products_purchased FROM Orders o JOIN Order_Items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id GROUP BY o.customer_id;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve gender for each customer returned by step 1 from the users database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, gender_code FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);
